topic.title: History Of Past Illness Section - conformance rules

section.p: The History of Past Illness section shall contain a narrative description of the conditions the patient suffered in the past. It shall include entries for problems as described in the Entry Content Modules.

ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "11348-0" HISTORY OF PAST ILLNESS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)
